Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: "After checking several times to make sure no one is following, you grip the warning letter in your hand and step into the elevator to the windmill tower's top."}
{3: "It's a letter foretelling a crime, and as you look at it, you can almost hear a woman's soft humming in your ear."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory894.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: "?Windmill tower's falling down, falling down, falling down. Windmill tower's falling down, falling down, falling down.?{226|153|170}", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'My dear Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: "I imagine you're currently indulging in Constellia's cloyingly sweet, peaceful, and dreadfully dull festival games.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Ha! How unbearably dull. Why don't I add a little excitement...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "I've planted a bomb at the top of Constellia's windmill tower, one that's powerful enough to bring the whole thing down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Picture it. All those carefree laughs replaced by screams and wails in the wake of one deafening blast.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'I can hardly contain my excitement...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Heh... there's no way you'd just stand by and let it happen.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "You know where to find me. That's right, as close to the bomb as possible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "<i>Don't worry. When the windmill tower falls, at least we'll fall together.<i>", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: '<i>After all...<i>', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: '<i>"If a person never falls in their lifetime, they\'ll only know what falling feels like when they die."<i>', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory688.jpg'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{3: 'Your lips move silently as you mouth the name of the sender.'}
{3: 'The elevator rises quickly, and you stand alone inside, running through the situation in your mind.'}
{3: 'The moment you learned of the bomb, you alerted Babylonia, and Constellia offered to send a team to assist in its removal.'}
{3: 'But you refused their offer.'}
{3: "You can't be sure whether this Ascendant, Eleanor, really planted a bomb, but given her unpredictable nature, it's safer to follow her so?called rules."}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory687.jpg'}
{3: 'Ding. The elevator reaches the top.'}
{3: 'Your standard?issue pistol is already in hand as you step out, fully alert, only to catch a whiff of a dangerous sweet scent.'}
{3: "You've imagined countless ways you might meet her again, but what greets you now is nothing like you pictured."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The somewhat familiar Ascendant is tied to a chair, hands and feet bound, with the promised bomb sitting right on her lap.'}
{3: "If you hadn't dealt with her many times before, you might think she's just an unfortunate victim."}
{3: 'Seeing you arrive on schedule, she shifts slightly against her restraints, looking even more pitiful.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'My dear Commandant, it delights me to see you take my message so seriously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "But... as you can see, my hands and feet are tied, so I can't stand to greet you. How rude of me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her politeness earns no courtesy in return. Before she says another word, you already have your gun aimed at her.'}
{2: 'What game are you playing?', 3: '84', 4: 'Do you have anyone else working with you?', 5: '88'}
{3: 'Even the sturdiest restraints would be as easy for her to break as a strand of hair.'}
{3: 'Maybe, out of respect for the role of a "helpless damsel," she is letting herself be bound, submitting to these thin ropes for the moment.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Look at me like this, Commandant. Do you really think I could still pull any tricks?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Don't overthink it. Do I look like the kind who gets along with other Ascendants?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "I can't even move, and you're still pointing a gun at me. That's a bit crude, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't believe those ropes can actually restrain you.", 3: '93'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Ah... I didn't think I'd left you with such an unladylike impression of me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is the bomb real?', 3: '96'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Why don't you guess? Either way, you'll end up checking it yourself, won't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as she says, you ignore her words and focus on the box in her lap, inspecting it closely.'}
{2: 'How do I disarm it?', 3: '103', 4: 'Tell me how to disarm it.', 5: '103'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "It's simple. The countdown is tied to my life. Pull the trigger, kill me, and the timer stops...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Still bound, she can't hide her smile any longer. A faint flush creeps across her cheeks, as if savoring the moment."}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Believe me or don't, Commandant. Either way, you'll have to choose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'So, will you save me, or kill me?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You say nothing, and her smile only widens, as if she's relishing the performance."}

{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Let me guess what\'s going through your head, "Should I save her? But this damned bomb is still threatening innocent lives in Constellia. Killing her would be the smarter choice."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'No? Then maybe something harsher, "Kill her! She\'s an Ascendant, humanity\'s enemy. One shot and this bomb threat disappears instantly."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Well? Did I get it right?', 4: '1'}
{3: "But you seem done with her little mind games. You lower your gun, crouch in front of her, and focus back on the bomb's timer."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: '...Such a simple device, and the Gray Raven Commandant still feels the need to check it twice?', 4: '1'}
{2: "You shouldn't treat your life so lightly.", 3: '125'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "On the contrary, Commandant. I value my life, and that's exactly why I've placed it in your hands.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'I\'m just sitting here, playing the part of a poor, clueless woman under threat from a bomb, waiting for the righteous Commandant to "save" me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'I believe the Gray Raven Commandant can weigh the value of a life with precision, even if... it belongs to an enemy.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You seem to have made up your mind. You lower your gun at last and start to undo her restraints.'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Commandant, you've certainly surprised me. So, this is your choice in the end?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiMovie/FxUiMovieDao.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The moment her legs are freed, she kicks upward without warning, her sharp heel coming dangerously close to your chin.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: '"Save everyone you can," is it? I think I\'m starting to like you more. Maybe we don\'t have to be enemies after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I trust my instincts. The bomb is probably fake.', 3: '147'}
{2: 'But to rule out every possible risk...', 3: '148'}
{3: 'You glance again at the numbers racing toward zero, then start working to disarm it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: "...Still so earnest. I wonder how many more surprises you have in you. I'm almost starting to feel bad watching you struggle all alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lend me your processing power. We need to run through every possible passcode.', 3: '153'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'And what if I give you a fake code?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Everyone else has already been evacuated. Only you and I remain in the blast radius.', 3: '156'}
{3: 'You lift your gaze from the maze of wires to meet her eyes.'}
{2: 'Worst case, we end up on the front page of the next Communication Bulletin.', 3: '158'}

{2: 'Eleanor', 3: '"Gray Raven Commandant and Ascendant Plunge to Their Death at Constellia\'s Double Seventh Festival"? I have to admire your sense of humor in a crisis. But don\'t worry, I also want to see just how far you can go.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Time doesn't slow for this uneasy alliance between two rivals. The countdown keeps outpacing your progress."}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Ahh... Looks like this is as far as we go.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thirty seconds left. Nowhere near enough to finish.'}
{2: 'Eleanor, one last time, is it real?', 3: '167', 4: '...Too late.', 5: '167'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "You already know the answer, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The enigmatic curve of her smile confirms the answer in your heart.'}
{3: 'Ten seconds left... 9, 8, 7, 6, 5...'}
{2: '(Throw the bomb with all your might!)', 3: '173'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg'}
{3: 'The bomb spins through the air, and instead of exploding, it bursts into a cascade of vivid purple fireworks, mocking your fears.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Hahaha! Hahahahaha...', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Her laughter rings out behind you, wild and triumphant.'}
{2: 'Eleanorâ€”!', 3: '189', 4: '(Turn around to face the Ascendant)', 5: '189'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'But when you turn, ready to share the spectacle with your "enemy," the mysterious Ascendant is gone.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory687.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiRpgTowerMain3d/FxUiRpgTowerMain3d01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The ropes lie scattered on the ground, applauding her escape. The air still holds the scent of gunpowder laced with her dangerous perfume.'}
{3: 'On the chair, still carrying her fragrance, rests her final gift, a note in the same style as the warning letter.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiRpgTowerMain3d/FxUiRpgTowerMain3d01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{1: 'My dear Commandant, I simply adore that fire in you, that will to burn with everything you have.', 2: 'aa44d9ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Shame I dislike the tired old twist of bombs turning into fireworks.', 2: 'aa44d9ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'And worse, the smoke masks that scent that belongs only to you. Such a pity...', 2: 'aa44d9ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "But this will not be the last time we meet. Promise me you'll guard that little flame in you. Don't let it burn out too soon.", 2: 'aa44d9ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Next time, let me savor your essence properly.', 2: 'aa44d9ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'In the bottom left corner of the note, a purple lipstick mark remains, still carrying her scent.'}
